ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) package baby romaine lettuce leaves
1 cooked boneless chicken breast half, sliced into thin strips

cookingTips: Soak rice wrappers in warm water for 30 seconds until pliable but still slightly firm
Arrange ingredients in the center third of wrapper, roll tightly folding in sides first, then rolling forward
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These fresh, light spring rolls use Caesar dressing as the creative flavor base. Keep finished rolls covered with damp paper towels to prevent drying. Serve with extra Caesar dressing for dipping.
